name: QU@CK3RZ
description:
Imagine yourself as a duck. Imagine you have an axe. Imagine there are 20-year-old men in chicken costumes. Imagine you have an idea. Imagine yourself going qu@ck3rz.

Controls:

This duck can't control himself, why should you need controls? OK, enough with the stupid shit. Just Left Click any rando's you see and watch as the axe goes directly to their head. Neato!
